fullName.jp: ガラフ・ハルム・バルデシオン

description.jp: 記憶喪失の老戦士。その正体はバル国の王にして 暗黒魔道士エクスデスを封印した「暁の４戦士」のひとり。最愛の孫娘クルルと再会したことで完全に記憶を取り戻す。その後エクスデスから世界を守るべくバッツたちと共に奮起奮闘した。
description.gl: An elderly warrior suffering from amnesia. In truth, he is the king of Bal and one of the four Warriors of Dawn who sealed away warlock Exdeath in the past. Only when he reunites with his cherished granddaughter, Krile, does he fully regain his memories. In fear of the crystals' imminent destruction, he joins Bartz's party on their quest.

jp.text: 思い出せん……\nなにも思い出せんぞ！
こらー！\nわしを置いていくなー！
うっ……頭が痛い！\n記憶喪失じゃ！
まだまだ！\nまだまだ死ねんのじゃ！
この命 燃えつきても！\nわしは貴様を倒す！

gl.text: I don't remember... Ehh...? I can't remember anything!
That was an awfully quick decision to ditch me!
...Ohh、 my aching head! I can't remember a thing!
Takes a lot more than that for me to kick the bucket!
I'll destroy you...even if it means I have to take you into the afterlife myself!

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Shirahadori(C)]
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Call Effect boost
　∟ MAX BRV Up effect +10%
　∟ Physical Evasion Rate Up effect +40%
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Shirahadori (C):
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight special effect MAX BRV Up effect boost
 • Moderate special effect PHY Evasion Up effect boost
rank_up_desc.jp:
「しらはどり【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・使用後特殊効果の「最大BRVアップ」の効果小アップと
　「物理回避率アップ」の効果中アップ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Greatsword of Dawn (C)]
• Becomes 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 80% 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV 
• Call Effect +10%
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Dawn Katana (C):
 • 6-hit group melee BRV  attack + group HP  attack becomes 4-hit group melee BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 2 times; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
 • Slight special effect boost after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「暁の太刀【C】」使用時
・6HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

desc.en:
Increases own BRV by 50% of MAX BRV
6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV 
Deals split HP damage between all targets

Self: 3 turns [Decisive Struggle]
Allies: 8 turns [Cover]

While [Decisive Struggle] is active
• Party effects
 ∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 40%
 ∟ Increases stolen and gained BRV overflow limits by 20%
 ∟ Restores 20% of HP
• Increases HP Damage dealt by 20%
• Resists K.O. when HP reaches 0
• Recovers 1 HP when effect ends
• Consumes 40% Current HP after every action
• After taking damage or successful evasion, triggers [Decisive Strike]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 50% Max BRV + HP attack
　∟ 4-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on MAX BRV
6-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns Battle to the Death
Allies: 8 turns Cover buff

Triggers following effects while Battle to the Death active:
 • KO avoided at 0 HP
 • Restores 1 HP when Battle to the Death canceled
 • Moderately consumes own HP after turn (will not KO)
 • Triggers following Final Strike when taking or avoiding BRV attack, HP attack, debuff:
 • Increases BRV based on MAX BRV
 • HP attack
 • 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Grants party BRV based on cumulative HP damage dealt
desc.jp:
自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
＋6HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に3ACTION「死力を尽くす決戦」付与
自身以外の味方全員に8ACTION強化効果「かばう」付与
「死力を尽くす決戦」付与中　以下の効果が発動
・HPが0になっても戦闘不能にならず 解除時にHPを1回復
・自身の行動後　自身のHPを中消費（この効果によって戦闘不能にはならない）
・自身がBRV攻撃またはHP攻撃または弱体効果の付与を受けた時または回避時
　以下の「決死の一撃」が発動
　-自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算＋HP攻撃
　 ＋4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
　-与えた合計HPダメージに依存した量のBRVを味方全員に加算

ガラフをコールしたキャラクターに
「最大BRV小アップ」「物理回避率中アップ」の効果

name.jp: ステータスアップ（コール中）

desc.jp: コールガラフ用先付内部バフ
物理回避

desc.gl:
Galuf's ability when called:
 • Largely raises own MAX BRV
 • Moderately raises own ATK
 • Increases BRV based on ATK, then further increases BRV × 2.0
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

Special effect for 3 turns after use:
 • Grants Galuf's calling party member MAX BRV Up I, PHY Evasion Up V effect
desc.jp:
コールされたガラフが以下の行動を行う
自身の最大BRV大アップと攻撃力中アップし
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋自身のBRVを2.0倍にアップ
＋3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

使用後特殊効果：3ACTION
ガラフをコールしたキャラクターに
「最大BRV小アップ」「物理回避率極大アップ」の効果

name.jp: ステータスアップ（コール中）

desc.jp: コールガラフ用先付内部バフ
物理回避

desc.en:
When called for assistance, Galuf performs the following actions
• Raises Max BRV by 80%, Attack by 60%
• Increases own BRV by 50% of Max BRV
• 6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Deals split HP damage between all targets

3 turns Call Effect (party-wide)
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 10%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 10%
desc.gl:
Galuf's ability when called:
 • Largely raises own MAX BRV
 • Moderately raises own ATK
 • Increases BRV based on MAX BRV
 • 6-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target

Special effect for 3 turns after use:
 • Slightly increases party's BRV damage dealt
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
desc.jp:
コールされたガラフが以下の行動を行う
自身の最大BRV大アップと攻撃力中アップし
自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
＋6HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配

使用後特殊効果：3ACTION
味方全員の与えるBRVダメージと
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを越えて加算する上限小アップ

desc.gl: Largely raises MAX BRV, moderately raises SPD with active buffs

short_desc.gl: Buff Boost Speed Up: Raises MAX BRV, SPD
short_desc.jp: バフブーストスピードアップ：最大BRVと素早さがアップ

desc.en:
[Cover] use +2

When using [Cover], [Cover+]
• [Cover] effect +10%, duration +3
• Allies: 8 turns 60% [MAX BRV Up]
• [ATK Up] effect +30%, duration +7 
• Increases party's BRV by 50% of MAX BRV

While buffed
[HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
• Increases own BRV by 20% of MAX BRV before BRV attacks
• melee BRV attack + HP attack (100)
desc.gl:
Cover use +2

When using Cover, Cover+:
 • Slight Cover buff boost, duration +3
 • Allies: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II
 • Slight ATK Up boost, duration +7
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV

With active buff:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Increases BRV based on MAX BRV; melee BRV attack + HP attack)
desc.jp:
「かばう」の使用回数＋2

「かばう」「かばう＋」使用時
・強化効果「かばう」の効果小アップと3ACTION期間延長
・自身以外の味方全員に8ACTION「最大BRV中アップ」付与
・「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップと7ACTION期間延長
・味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算

　自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算

name.jp: しらはどりエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Shirahadori], [Shirahadori+]
• Increases own BRV by 100% of ATK
• Increases own BRV by 100% Current BRV
• Triggers 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack after BRV gains (80x3)
• [PHY Evasion Up], [DEFe Up] duration +5
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +20%, duration +14

When using [Shirahadori]
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 

When using [Shirahadori+]
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV 

When using [Counter] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• triggers additional HP attack after use
• Increases own BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt

When using [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Increases total BRV potency by 50%
desc.gl:

 • Increases BRV based on ATK then BRV × 2.0 + 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • PHY Evasion Up, DEF Up duration +5
 • 20 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up

When using Shirahadori:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Shirahadori+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Counter while PHY Evasion Up from Shirahadori+ active:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt

When using BRV Attack, BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
